sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './qna.css' function Qna({data}) { const [reply, setReply] = useState(false) const [comment, setComment] = useState("") return (
Q {data.comment}
{data.answer.length ? data.answer.map((ans) => (
A {ans.answer}
)) :
No Replies Yet
}
{reply ?
{setComment(e.target.value)}}/>
: "" }
) } export default Qna
